nodes.text: Ferroceramic was a material that could be used to make armor. The bodies of BT-series ordnance droids were coated in brown and silver colored ferroceramic armor.

Ferroceramic was mentioned in the 2018 roleplaying supplement Fully Operational, which was released by Fantasy Flight Games as part of the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion. The material originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the 1999 novel X-Wing: Isard's Revenge, which was written by Michael A. Stackpole.
